 DzInvertManip (Boolean onOff=false)

Detailed Description

A manipulator that inverts the color channels of an image layer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzInvertManip::DzInvertManip ( Boolean  onOff = false  ) 

Default Constructor

Member Data Documentation

Boolean DzInvertManip::on

If true, the color channels of the image layer are inverted, otherwise, the layer is not inverted.
